node1.PC_Text: Long time no see, boss man!
node1.NPC_Response: Hello again, Annie. I just saw you.

A.PC_Text: I've been hoping to have more one-on-one time to get to know you.
A.NPC_Response: Uhh… sure that would be nice.

B.PC_Text: I'm doing well! It's beautiful weather today!
I'm feeling good! I just caught up on all of my favorite tv shows this weekend.
Not so good. My boyfriend dumped me this weekend.
B.NPC_Response: Oh, I am sorry to hear that.

C.PC_Text: Yes, of course! I'm just joking around.
C.NPC_Response: Yes, well nice to see you again. How are you settling in?

C.PC_Text: That's true. So where are you off to? Can I come?
C.NPC_Response: Just grabbing a coffee from the kitchen.

C.PC_Text: Even ten minutes is too long.

AA.PC_Text: I'm so excited to be here.
AA.NPC_Response: That's great. We are happy to have you here.

AA.PC_Text: I hear this is a pretty easy going place to work! You can come in any time you like!
AA.NPC_Response: Well, I think we try to be flexible.

AA.PC_Text: I hear you can get away with anything here! I'm going to start coming in at 12:00!
AA.NPC_Response: I don’t know where you heard that but I don’t think it’s true.

AB.PC_Text: Maybe we can have a team lunch this week!
AB.NPC_Response: That sounds like a good idea.

AB.PC_Text: I've been watching you from across the room.
AB.NPC_Response: Uh… well I am right here. Next time just come say hello.

AB.PC_Text: I've been checking your Facebook status and Linked In profiles everyday to learn more about you.
AB.NPC_Response: That's… flattering, I guess but I prefer if you wouldn't do that.

AC.NPC_Response: Well, I should get back to work.

AC.PC_Text: Come on, Mike.  How YOU doing? You know...  Want to get a drink after work?

BA.PC_Text: I might take a walk at lunch and enjoy some fresh air.
BA.NPC_Response: That sounds like a nice idea.

BA.PC_Text: Do you want to take a walk with me outside?
BA.NPC_Response: I have to do some work actually.

BA.PC_Text: Let's go for a walk together outside and get to know each other's darkest secrets!
BA.NPC_Response: I'm very busy. I need to get back to work, actually.

BB.NPC_Response: I'm glad you had a nice weekend.

BB.PC_Text: I needed it! Work has really been cramping my TV style…
I'm trying to watch tv while I'm at work so I can stay caught up!

BC.PC_Text: It's ok. We weren't together long.
BC.NPC_Response: I'm sure you will meet someone else.

BC.PC_Text: Yea, it was on my birthday too. He sang "Happy birthday to you…  I think we are through!"
BC.NPC_Response: Oh, that sounds awful. I, uh, don’t know what to say.

BC.PC_Text: It's ok. I already have eyes for my new manager. Hint, hint.
BC.NPC_Response: I, uh... I am married, Annie.

CA.PC_Text: I'm doing great! Everyone is so friendly.
It's great. All those terrible rumors I heard don't seem to be true.
CA.NPC_Response: What rumors? I should hope not!

CA.PC_Text: I am loving it here. I am even sleeping here at night.
CA.NPC_Response: Uh, I don’t think you’re allowed to do that.

CB.PC_Text: The coffee machine we have is amazing.
CB.NPC_Response: It is. I chose it myself.

CB.PC_Text: Oh, good. I need a cup of coffee too. I'll join you.
And you didn’t tell me? You know I am trying to follow your routine exactly.
CB.NPC_Response: I definitely didn’t know that. Why would you do that?

CC.NPC_Response: Well, I will see you around then.

CC.PC_Text: What do you think about sharing an office ? This way we can really spend all day together.
CC.NPC_Response: I think you are fine where you are.
